scripts.build: yarn create-outdir && node scripts/build.js && electron-builder -c config/electron-builder.json
scripts.build:win: yarn create-outdir && node scripts/build.js && electron-builder -c config/electron-builder.json --win
scripts.build:mac: yarn create-outdir && node scripts/build.js && electron-builder -c config/electron-builder.json --mac
scripts.build:arm: yarn create-outdir && node scripts/build.js && electron-builder -c config/electron-builder.json --arm64
scripts.build:linux: yarn create-outdir && node scripts/build.js && electron-builder -c config/electron-builder.json --linux
